title: My children are orphans, they get benefits and charity money, if there is an excess, can I use it to
transcript: aisha from the uk um i wanted to ask um this question is regarding orphans um if i'm raising my older children am i able um am i allowed to help any of my siblings or family member that is me in need with my my children's money i have orphans my children and they got they get benefits they get charity money so can i after spending all what they need on them if i have access with me of money can i give it to my needy siblings answer is no this money came for these orphans individually one two three it has to be theirs until they grow up even if it reaches millions of dollars you have no right in giving a penny of them to anyone else
